desc: Rustic décor/farmhouse style handmade made products from recycled wood, and salvaged materials. Rustic organization & décor, farm fresh flavors including organic hard neck garlic, and spice blends for cooking. All made on our small homestead in central Maine.

layout.text: Locally Maine made products from recycled wood, and salvaged materials. Rustic organization & décor, and farm fresh flavors.
